channel.title: Making It So Any One Can Ware Anything!
channel.description: Hey so i have a hybrid pvp v3 source. And in it if you are not a donator you cant ware torva. But i want to make it so administrators can ware it and yes owners can allready :P so if you know how to fix this please tell me :P Thanks in Advance!

item.title: Making It So Any One Can Ware Anything!
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

For one your spelling “wear” wrong.(I know this isn’t English class)
Change the donator items in ItemAssistant.java I believe.

Read full topic
